name: Sphereship Scrimmage
description:
Charge your laser to disintegrate the space rocks before you're overwhelmed. Your beam can be charged for a wider and longer-lasting beam. Getting hit will cause fires to start in your ship. You can toggle views and then run into the flames to put them out. Flames will spread over time unless completely extinguished.  If the temperature gets too high, it's game over. Try not to get roasted!

Arrow Keys: Thrusters

Z: Toggle view

X: Charge laser (release to shoot)
